 Description: 

                              Frontline is Insurance domain project, there are 4- dashboards which have around       32 drill down & summarized reports. To design all these reports we have to develop data mart in relational modeling. To develop same data mart there are four layers of data Staging, Master, Reporting and Aggregation. System got 17 transactional files first we dumped data into staging tables then do the data cleansing /profiling after that cleaned data loaded into Master tables in SCD-2 format to maintain historical changes. Once data reached till master layer this layer have all cleaned & trusted data which we can use further for calculation & reporting purpose. From Master Layer data will be loaded into Reporting layer, reports tables are designed in such way so these reporting tables can provide all relevant information to respective dashboards. To summarize the data we have created one more layer aggregation layer this layer provide pre-aggregated data to summarized reports/ dashboards.

To handling errors there are respective error tables, these error tables contain error out data with proper error
Description, once all process finished, system will send all error rows to client in mail for further process.
To Handle all SSIS process & data Base Scripts there are one ETL log table which provide unique id to all jobs and 
Summarized information like file-count, error-count, master table row count.
Responsibilities:

· Involved in database design using relational modeling.

DESCRIPTION:
               IKEA is a privately-owned, international, low-cost home products retailer that sells modern, utilitarian design furniture, much of which is assembled by the consumer. 
The owner/franchiser of the IKEA trademark and the IKEA Concept is Inter IKEA Systems B.V. 
It has corporate offices in Netherlands, Sweden and Belgium. 

ABOUT THE PROJECT:
The main objective of this project is to provide reports and dashboard solutions to the Forecast management team who are primarily involved in Forecasting business. This gives them the insights on Visualize the forecast (development) for the different forecast and sales channels in order to provide planning input. Data is extracted from several data sources such as Oracle SQL, SQL server, Excel files, QVDs into the QlikView reporting layer and modeled for a perfect association of data.

ROLES AND RESPOSIBILITIES:

Understanding the requirements and functional specifications.
Preparing report specification and Unit test plan.
Gathered data sources from various tables and developed the QlikView Data Models.
Interacted with clients directly at onsite and demonstrated about ongoing process with clients by means of diagrams and reports in regular interval to make sure without any deviation. 
Effectively handled synthetic and circular loops to prepare perfect data models.
Implemented cyclic group, Drill Down and a combination of both for better navigation.
Developed Qlikview dashboards using various Charts, List box, Table box, Multi box & Containers.
Implemented SET Analysis for effective filtering to overcome complex nested IF condition for better performance.
Developing User Interactive Sheets & Reports as per business needs.
Writing SQL Queries to check database competencies.
Coding, Unit testing and Peer review.
Supported Deployment team of clients to deploy Qlikview Applications.

Provisioning framework expert for numerous client systems like CPAC (Clinical portal and collaboration), SPECTRUM, RDR (Research and Development Repository), CLMS (Clinical Learning Management System) and CORE (Clinical Operational and Reporting Environment).
